video.title: Heartless
video.synopsis: Orphaned twins who must suck the life force out of people to stay alive move to a strange, old boarding school to explore their dark family history.

episodes.synopsis: Twin siblings Sebastian and Sofie enroll in Ottmansgaard boarding school hoping to discover the secret of their supernatural natures.
episodes.title: Heartless: Season 1: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: The twins discover why their mother attended Ottmasgaard. Sofie's roommate falls for Sebastian. Ditlev and the prefects prepare to haze new students.
episodes.title: Heartless: Season 1: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Sofie and Emilie's friendship deepens. The twins discover that their secret dates back many years. Ditlev's obsession with Sofie remains a problem.
episodes.title: Heartless: Season 1: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Emilie's father investigates a shocking death close to the school. The twins try to keep their secret from Nadja. Sebastian falls for a servant.
episodes.title: Heartless: Season 1: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: The twins must take drastic action to prevent Nadja from learning their secret. Sebastian has to deal with Josefine's violent ex-boyfriend.
episodes.title: Heartless: Season 1: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: Headmaster Just hunts the black-eyes at the school while his daughter Emilie learns Sofie's secret. The twins discover a graveyard in the forest.
episodes.title: Heartless: Season 1: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: The twins team up with a stranger to hunt the gold heart, with fatal consequences. Just reveals how far he's willing to go to fight the black-eyes.
episodes.title: Heartless: Season 1: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The truth comes out about Sofie and Sebastian's curse and the death of Emilie's mother, forcing her to decide between the twins and her own family.
episodes.title: Heartless: Season 1: Episode 8
